content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Google Maps and DB Navigator will definitely be useful in helping you navigate Munich and Germany. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further recommendations.

Remember to also explore Munich's neighborhoods, try some traditional Bavarian food and beer, and visit some of the local markets and festivals. And if you need any help or have questions while you're in Munich, you can always ask a local or a fellow expat for assistance.

Have a great time in Munich, and I hope you make the most of your four months there! Prost!
